name: Pedro: the Windows Washer
description:
Controls :

Rebindable controls in the launcher

T to display/hide timer

S to display/hide score

R to restart

It's recommended to play with a 16:9 ratio to avoid any visual issue!

Pedro is really good at washing windows. he loves his job. Maybe if he works hard enough he'll be able to wash windows in some fancy places ?
This is a goofy platformer with some challenging levels for dedicated players.
This is our first game so feedback is greatly appreciated.

Listen and download the OST for free here, and listen to the bonus Nightmare Nuclear Powerplant track : https://soundcloud.com/majorwipeout/sets/pedro-off... !
